fxInfo_citation: Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_cross_coder_aggregation: Bayesian Item Response Theory Measurement Model
fxInfo_question: Does the lower (or unicameral) chamber of the legislature have a functioning committee system?

fxInfo_responses.value: Yes, but there are only special (not permanent) committees.
Yes, there are permanent committees, but they are not very significant in affecting the course of policy.
Yes, there are permanent committees that have strong influence on the course of policymaking.

fxInfo_scale: Ordinal, converted to interval by the measurement model
name: v2lgcomslo, *_osp, *_ord
